snippet: Jon Cruz, 31, a teacher at the Bronx High School of Science, paid three teenage boys to send him nude or suggestive photographs, the criminal complaint says.
abstract: Jon Cruz, Bronx High School of Science teacher and debate coach, is arrested on child pornography charges for allegedly persuading teenage boys to send him revealing photos in exchange for gift cards.

byline.contributor: Elizabeth A. Harris and Colin Moynihan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Jon Cruz, 31, a teacher at the Bronx High School of Science, paid three teenage boys to send him nude or suggestive photographs, the criminal complaint says.

headline.main: Bronx Teacher Faces Pornography Charges; Accused of Paying Boys for Photos
headline.print_headline: Bronx Teacher Faces Pornography Charges; Accused of Paying Boys for Photos
